info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 10 at 1:01AM CDT until August 10 at 1:45AM CDT by NWS Hastings NE
info.description:
SVRGID
The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a
* Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Thayer County in south central Nebraska...
* Until 145 AM CDT.
* At 101 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Davenport to near Hubbell to near Aurora, moving east at 50 mph.
THESE ARE DESTRUCTIVE STORMS FOR HEBRON AND SURROUNDING AREAS.
HAZARD...90 mph wind gusts.
SOURCE...Radar indicated.
IMPACT...You are in a life-threatening situation. Flying debris may be deadly to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be heavily damaged or destroyed. Homes and businesses will have substantial roof and window damage. Expect extensive tree damage and power outages.
* Severe thunderstorms will be near... Hebron, Davenport, Carleton, and Hubbell around 105 AM CDT. Belvidere around 110 AM CDT. Bruning and Gilead around 115 AM CDT. Alexandria around 120 AM CDT.
info.instruction:
Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. If you spot a tornado go at once into the basement or small central room in a sturdy structure.
For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

parameter.value: NWS:DESTRUCTIVE WIND STORM in this area til 145 AM CDT. Take shelter now. Check media.

National Weather Service: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING in effect for this area until 1:45 AM CDT for DESTRUCTIVE 90 mph winds. Take shelter in a sturdy building, away from windows. Flying debris may be deadly to those caught without shelter.

parameter.value: SNM:TORMENTA DE VIENTO DESTRUCTIVA en esta area hasta 145 AM CDT. Tome refugio ahora

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: AVISO DE TORMENTA SEVERA en efecto para esta area hasta las 1:45 AM CDT por vientos DESTRUCTIVOS de 90 mph. Tome refugio en un edificio, alejado de las ventanas. Escombros arrastrados por el viento podrian ser mortales para aquellos que se encuentran sin refugio.
